org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Class AeDeploymentInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.AeDeploymentInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeDeploymentInfo, java.io.Serializable
public class AeDeploymentInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IAeDeploymentInfo

This class represents information about the deployment of a single deployment unit (PDD) within a BPR.

See Also:
